import React, { Component, useRef } from 'react'; import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser'; const Contactform = () => { const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm( process.env.REACT_APP_YOUR_SERVICE_ID, process.env.REACT_APP_YOUR_TEMPLATE_ID, form.current, process.env.REACT_APP_YOUR_PUBLIC_KEY ) .then( (result) => { console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); } ); }; return (
Contactanos
